import.name: Raging
import.description: Smash!

import.name: Stealthing
import.description:
You are currently attempting to be stealthy.

Note your roll with the effect.

import.name: Heroes Feast
Charmed
import.description: You are charmed.
import.note:
Previous Conditions: {
    "paralyzed": false,
    "acid": false,
    "frightened": false,
    "fatigued": false,
    "grappled": false,
    "muted": false,
    "petrified": false,
    "poisoned": false,
    "restrained": false,
    "stunned": false,
    "surprising": false,
    "frozen": false,
    "deafened": false,
    "charmed": true
}

import.name: Mindless Raging
import.description: Smash! Mindless Smash!

import.name: Surprise!
import.description: You have managed to catch the enemy unaware.

import.name: Red Glow
import.description: Holding a red crystal in your hand seems to have imparted you with a red glow.
import.note:
Red is "The Curator"

This is for general color alignment puzzles and is imparted by holding the crystal.

Look for other purposes.

import.name: Blue Glow
import.description: Holding a blue crystal in your hand seems to have imparted you with a blue glow.
import.note:
Blue is "The Citizen"

This is for general color alignment puzzles and is imparted by holding the crystal.

Look for other purposes.

import.name: Green Glow
import.description: Holding a green crystal in your hand seems to have imparted you with a green glow.
import.note:
Green is "The Crafter"

This is for general color alignment puzzles and is imparted by holding the crystal.

Look for other purposes.

import.name: Divine Favor
import.description:
You have been blessed with divine favor.

Your attacks deal additional damage.

import.name: Self Heating
import.description: This cauldron applies heat to itself to help with brewing potions.

import.name: Orange Glow
import.description: Holding a orange crystal in your hand seems to have imparted you with a orange glow.
import.note:
Orange is "The Composer"

This is for general color alignment puzzles and is imparted by holding the crystal.

Look for other purposes.

import.name: Lime Glow
import.description: Holding a lime crystal in your hand seems to have imparted you with a lime glow.
import.note:
This is for general color alignment puzzles and is imparted by holding the crystal.

Look for other purposes.

Lime is "The Conformist"

import.name: Chromatic Glow
import.description: Holding a silver crystal in your hand seems to have imparted you with a fluctuating spectral glow.
import.note:
Silver is "The Commuter"

This is for general color alignment puzzles and is imparted by holding the crystal.

Additionally this crystal serves as a dimensional manipulator.

Look for other purposes.

import.name: Golden Viens
import.description:
Holding a golden crystal in your hand seems to have caused your veins to show with a matte golden line.

Your mind feels an almost unbelivable clarity.

At the end of every round of combat, you must pass a DC${20-(int+wis)/2,,orange}$ ${Constitution}$ check or be overwhelmed and drop the crystal.
import.note: Gold is "The Creator"

import.name: Shield of Faith
import.description: You have been blessed with protection.

import.name: Freedom of Movement
import.description:
You are unaffected by difficult terrain, and magic can not restrain, paralyze, or reduce the your movement.

You can also spend 1 stud of movement to slip any non magical restraints and water poses no movement penalty.

import.name: Stoneskin
import.description: You have gained skin of stone, granting damage resistance.

import.name: Bad Trip
import.description: You are having a bad time with Guiness' Blend.

import.name: Guidance
import.description: You may add 1d4 to an ability check once. Then this is consumed.

import.name: Bane
import.description:
You must roll 1d4 with every attack or saving throw and subtract that from the roll.

Also depends on the concentration of the caster.

import.name: Bless
import.description:
You can roll 1d4 with any attack or saving throw and add that to the roll.

Also depends on the caster maintaining concentration.

import.name: Sanctuary
import.description:
For anyone to attack you or target you directly with a spell, they must pass a wisdom save against the caster's DC for the Sanctuary spell, or choose another target.

Traps and other things that can not choose another target, or if none is available, simple fizzle.

If you deal damage to any creature, this effect ends.

You are still subject to Area of Effect spells.

import.name: Paralyzed
import.description:
You are paralyzed and can not move.

When struck by a melee attack, it automatically criticals.

Attacks against you have advantage.

import.name: Protection from Poison
import.description: You have an advantage on any saving throws involving poison.

import.name: Warded Bond
import.description:
Half of all damage you take transfers to the creature that placed the ward upon you. Type of the damage carries.

Additionally you add 1 to any saving check.

If multiple people have warded you, the damage is split equally between all of you. The effect of the AC and saving throw bonus does not stack.

import.name: Warding Bond
import.description:
You take part of the damage from the creature you have warded. The damage taken is an equal distribution between you, the warded creature, and any other creatures warding the one taking damage.

Damage taken by you, is whole taken by you yourself.

import.name: Animal Friend
import.description: This animal is friendly with the caster.
import.note:
Previous Conditions: {
    "paralyzed": false,
    "acid": false,
    "frightened": false,
    "fatigued": false,
    "grappled": false,
    "muted": false,
    "petrified": false,
    "poisoned": false,
    "restrained": false,
    "stunned": false,
    "surprising": false,
    "frozen": false,
    "deafened": false,
    "charmed": true
}

import.name: Vine Ensnared
import.description:
Strength check at end of round.

Piercing damage at start, use notes to track damage.
import.note:
Previous Conditions: {
    "paralyzed": false,
    "acid": false,
    "frightened": false,
    "fatigued": false,
    "grappled": false,
    "muted": false,
    "petrified": false,
    "poisoned": false,
    "restrained": true
}

import.name: Barkskinned
import.description: Your AC can not be less than ${16,,orange}$ for the duration of this effect.

import.name: Darkvision
import.description:
Can see ${30,,orange}$ studs in the dark as though there was full light.

Another ${20,,orange}$ studs as dim light.

import.name: Feigned Death
import.description:
In addition, your movement is 0, regardless of any bonuses.

Any melee attacks against you with malicious intent automatically hit, and automatically critical.

Ranged attacks have an advantage.
import.note:
Previous Conditions: {
    "paralyzed": false,
    "acid": false,
    "frightened": false,
    "fatigued": false,
    "grappled": false,
    "muted": false,
    "petrified": false,
    "poisoned": false,
    "restrained": false,
    "stunned": false,
    "surprising": false,
    "frozen": false,
    "deafened": false,
    "blinded": false
}

Previous Immunities: {
    "poisoned": true
}

import.name: Beacon of Hope
import.description:
Advantage wisdom & death saving throws.

When being healed, take the maximum of the rolls instead of rolling for your health points.

Depends on the caster's concentration.

import.name: Cursed Constitution
import.description:
You have a disadvantage attacking the creature who cursed you.

If a creature cursed you, a Wisdom save at the start of your turn to remove the curse. Otherwise, you are cursed until your next rest.

When struck by the creature that cursed you, you take an additional 1d8 necrotic.

import.name: Cursed Dexterity
import.description:
You have a disadvantage attacking the creature who cursed you.

If a creature cursed you, a Wisdom save at the start of your turn to remove the curse. Otherwise, you are cursed until your next rest.

When struck by the creature that cursed you, you take an additional 1d8 necrotic.

import.name: Cursed Intelligence
import.description:
You have a disadvantage attacking the creature who cursed you.

If a creature cursed you, a Wisdom save at the start of your turn to remove the curse. Otherwise, you are cursed until your next rest.

When struck by the creature that cursed you, you take an additional 1d8 necrotic.

import.name: Cursed Wisdom
import.description:
You have a disadvantage attacking the creature who cursed you.

If a creature cursed you, a Wisdom save at the start of your turn to remove the curse. Otherwise, you are cursed until your next rest.

When struck by the creature that cursed you, you take an additional 1d8 necrotic.

import.name: Absorb Acid
import.description: Ends at the end of your next turn or after your first successful attack.

import.name: Groovy
import.description: The music is moving you.

import.name: Curse of Aevum
import.description:
Time requirements and durations for your spells is doubled;

For Example:
+ Revivify must occur within 1 minute of death, but can now occur within 2 minutes.
+ Floating Disk lasts 1 minute and will now last 2 minutes.

However, for this, you suffer a weakened spell DC between 2 and 10.

import.name: Blessing of Aevum
import.description:
Time requirements and durations for your spells is doubled;

For Example:
+ Revivify must occur within 1 minute of death, but can now occur within 2 minutes.
+ Floating Disk lasts 1 minute and will now last 2 minutes.

You suffer no spell DC penalty.

import.name: Absorb Cold
import.description: Ends at the end of your next turn or after your first successful attack.

import.name: Absorb Fire
import.description: Ends at the end of your next turn or after your first successful attack.

import.name: Absorb Lightning
import.description: Ends at the end of your next turn or after your first successful attack.

import.name: Absorb Necrotic
import.description: Ends at the end of your next turn or after your first successful attack.

import.name: Absorb Poison
import.description: Ends at the end of your next turn or after your first successful attack.

import.name: Absorb Psychic
import.description: Ends at the end of your next turn or after your first successful attack.

import.name: Absorb Radiant
import.description: Ends at the end of your next turn or after your first successful attack.

import.name: Absorb Thunder
import.description: Ends at the end of your next turn or after your first successful attack.

import.name: Hastened
import.description: You are hastened and have additional actions
import.note: Had Action Costs - Main: 1, Bonus: undefined, Reaction: undefined

import.name: Quickened
import.description: You are hastened and have additional actions
import.note: Had Action Costs - Main: 2, Bonus: undefined, Reaction: undefined

import.name: Cat's Vision
import.description: You have low light vision and see all dim light as normal light up to 60 studs out.

import.name: Webbed
import.description:
You have been encased in webbing and are restrained (Can not move your body beyond a wiggle).

You can spend an action to attempt to pass a strength check to break free.

Another creature may spend an action to attempt the strength check or attack the webbing.
import.note:
If the webbing is ignited by any fire, it incinerates immediately and deals 2d6 fire damage to the effected.

Webbing:
AC 10
HP 5

Strength DC:
12

Immuninities:
+ bludgeoning
+ poison
+ psychic

import.name: Waterbreathing
import.description: You can breathe water as though it were normal air.

import.name: Restrained
import.description:
You are restrained. You can use an action to attempt to break free.

Your movement is 0.

Attacks against you have advantage.

You have disadvantage on dex saving throws and ability checks.
import.note:
Previous Conditions: {
    "paralyzed": false,
    "acid": false,
    "frightened": false,
    "fatigued": false,
    "grappled": false,
    "muted": false,
    "petrified": false,
    "poisoned": false,
    "restrained": true
}

import.name: Unconscious
import.description:
You are unconscious.

Melee attacks against you have advantage and automatically critical.

Ranged attacks have advantage but do not have an automatic critical.

import.name: Good Trip
import.description: You are having a good time with Guiness' Blend. Let the colors wash over you.

import.name: Battle Music
import.description: The music has your adrenaline flowing.

import.name: Suffocating
import.description: Unable to breathe, you are now taking damage from your lack of oxygen.

import.name: Icy Mist
import.description: An icy mist surrounds you.

import.name: Shapeshifted
import.description: This creature has taken the shape of another creature.

import.name: Good Vibes
import.description: You had a good dream last night.

import.name: Bad Vibes
import.description: You had a nightmare last night.

import.name: Owl's Intelligence
import.description: Intelligence bonus from using a potion

import.name: Crow's Wisdom
import.description: Wisdom bonus from using a potion

import.name: Hangover
import.description: You have a disadvantage on all ability checks and saves.

import.name: Bear Rage (dep)
import.description: As a Barbarian following the spirit of the bear, your rage protects you even further. Smash!

import.name: Bear Rage
import.description: As a Barbarian following the spirit of the bear, your rage protects you even further. Smash!

import.name: Eagle Rage
import.description: As a Barbarian following the spirit of the eagle, your rage adds to your agility on the battlefield, allowing you to dash with your bonus action and enemies have disadvantage with attacks of opportunity on you. Smash!

import.name: Wolf Rage
import.description: As a Barbarian following the spirit of the wolf, your allies have advantage on their attacks against creatures within 3 studs of you. Smash!

import.name: Burning
import.description:
You are on fire!

At the end of your turn, you take fire damage until this effect ends or it is removed.

You or a creature next to you may spend an action to put the flames out.

import.name: Cursed
import.description:
You have a disadvantage attacking the creature who cursed you.

If a creature cursed you, a Wisdom save at the start of your turn to remove the curse. Otherwise, you are cursed until your next rest.

When struck by the creature that cursed you, you take an additional 1d8 necrotic.

import.name: Cursed Strength
import.description:
You have a disadvantage attacking the creature who cursed you.

If a creature cursed you, a Wisdom save at the start of your turn to remove the curse. Otherwise, you are cursed until your next rest.

When struck by the creature that cursed you, you take an additional 1d8 necrotic.

import.name: Cursed Charisma
import.description:
You have a disadvantage attacking the creature who cursed you.

If a creature cursed you, a Wisdom save at the start of your turn to remove the curse. Otherwise, you are cursed until your next rest.

When struck by the creature that cursed you, you take an additional 1d8 necrotic.

import.name: Damnation of Aevum
import.description:
Your spell DC is effectively 0.

Creatures can not critically fail their saving throws against your spells.

import.name: Common Traveler
import.description:
You possess the set of V's and have them all attuned:
+ Momento
+ Aura Lense
+ Aura Step

If you have aura step in your inventory or within 2 studs of a target you have successfully hit with Momento, you can see the creature (ie. Not Invisible or heavily obscured), and you have a charge on each of those 3 items, you may speak their command words in the below order:

"Vini Vidi Vici"

Upon speaking this, all charges are expended from all of the aforementioned items regardless of the target creatures success.

The creature you've stuck must succeed at a dexterity saving throw (DC:20) or take an additional 4d8 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 studs from you and knocked prone. On success, the creature takes no damage.

import.name: Guided Traveler
import.description: You are guided by a faint radiant glow on your mace granted by your cloak.

import.name: Third Eye
import.description: You now possess a third eye on your forehead, granting you additional reactions every round.

import.name: Prone
import.description:
You are prone.

Ranged attacks against you are at disadvantage.

Melee attacks against you are at advantage.

You may use half your movement to stand up or crawl at half your move speed and remain prone.

import.name: Investigating
import.description:
You are currently rummaging.

Note your roll with the effect.

import.name: Perceiving
import.description:
You are currently looking around.

Note your roll with the effect.

import.name: Perceiving
import.description:
You are currently looking around.

Note your roll with the effect.

import.name: Investigating
import.description:
You are currently rummaging.

Note your roll with the effect.

import.name: Hasted
import.description:
You are hasted.

One of your actions can only be used to Attack, Dash, or Disengage.
import.note: Had Action Costs - Main: 1, Bonus: undefined, Reaction: undefined

import.name: Gaseous Form
import.description:
You are in a gaseous form.

Your movement speed is 5 studs, you are flying, and you can occupy the space of other objects.

import.name: Flying
import.description: You are enchanted and able to fly.

import.name: Frightened
import.description:
While frightened you must take the Dash action and move away from the source of the frightening by the safest available route on each of your turns, unless there is nowhere to move.

If you end your turn in a location where you don't have line of sight to the source of the fear, you can make a Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, this effect ends.

This can occur in the middle of your turn.

import.name: Crane's Minute Meteors
import.description:
You have some number of meteors around you and can use your ${Bonus Action}$ to hurl up to ${2,,orange}$ meteors in any direction.

On impact, a single meteor deals damage (See the Spell) individually.

Use the effect notes to track the number of meteors left.

import.name: Autus Leaf
import.description:
Roll 1d6 to determine what grows:
1. Hair
2. Mustache
3. Beard
4. Chest Hair
5. Pubic Hair
6. Leg Hair

import.name: Dream Rose
import.description: You

import.name: Blessed Dream of Accuracy
import.description: One additional Accuracy

import.name: Inspiration
import.description: You may add an extra die to a Difficulty Check (DC) fo your choice before this effect ends.

import.name: Sacred Weapon
import.description: Your weapon is blessed with divine energy.

import.name: Faerie Fire
import.description:
Any attack rolls against you have advantage if the attacker can see you.

You can not benefit from any form of invisibility of camouflage.

You drop this effect when the source spell ends or the caster loses concentration.

import.name: Adaptive Resistance
import.description: You have adjusted to be partially resistant to a type of magic damage.

import.name: Digesting
import.description: You have been swallowed and are currently being digested. You take ${"class":"rs-orange",, "content":"1d8"}$ Acid damage at the start of your turn.

import.name: Mirror Image
import.description: Mirror images surround you.

import.name: Absorb Force
import.description: Ends at the end of your next turn or after your first successful attack.

import.name: Bone Armor
import.description:
Your body is loosely encased in bone, adding additional protection.

The external protrusions of bone on your person make interactions slightly more difficult.

This armor can be destroyed if you take more damage than the caster's health in one strike.

import.name: Calm Emotions
import.description:
Your emotions are magically calmed.

Duration is dependent on the caster maintaining concentration as well.

import.name: Bundled Up
import.description: Due to the cold you've bumdled up

import.name: Sana Leaf
import.description:
You have successfully consumed a Sana leaf.

Any healing you receive does not need to be rolled, you simply receive the maximum possible amount.

import.name: Sana Leaf Tea
import.description:
You have consumed Sana Leaf Tea.

Any healing you receive does not need to be rolled, you simply receive the maximum possible amount.

import.name: Vo Soi Sin Humming
import.description: Vo Soi Sin is filled with sea water and lightly humming.

import.name: Zephyred Movement
import.description:
You move like the wind. Until the spell ends, your movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Once before the spell ends, you can give yourself advantage on one weapon attack roll on your turn. That attack deals an extra ${1d8,,orange}$ Force damage on a hit. Whether you hit or miss, your walking speed increases by ${15,,orange}$ studs until the end of that turn.

import.name: Snared
import.description:
You can make a Dexterity saving throw with disadvantage at the end of each turn and end this effect on a success against the caster's Spell DC.

Alternatively, another creature that can reach you can use an action to make an Arcana check against to end the effect.

import.name: Invisibility
import.description: Mirror images surround you.

import.name: Frenzy
import.description: You are in a maddening frenzy and can attack with your bonus action if you attacked with your main action.

import.name: Frenzied Rage
import.description: You are in a maddening frenzy and can attack with your bonus action if you attacked with your main action.

import.name: Galvin's Venom
import.description:
You can feel your blood inside your body. Parts of your body glow a light green along your blood vessels and you feel slightly woozy.

You can feel your body struggling. You will occasionally take ${1d12,,orange}$ of ${Poison,,orange}$ or ${1d20,,orange}$ of ${Acid,,orange}$ depending on your situation and chemistry.
import.note: If someone tries to sleep with this affliction, they wake in the middle of the night vomiting and take 4d12 poison damage.

import.name: Harbinger's Curse
import.description:
You can feel your blood inside your body. Parts of your body show dark sickly looking black lines along your veins and you feel slightly woozy.

You can feel your body struggling. You take ${1d12,,orange}$ of ${Necrotic,,orange}$ periodically depending on what you are doing.
import.note: If someone tries to sleep with this affliction, they wake in the middle of the night vomiting and take 2d12 necrotic damage and do not get the benefits of a full night's rest.

import.name: Bleeding
import.description: You are bleeding profusely. This leaves a noticable blood trail and moving faster than half speed causes ${1,,darkorange}$ damage every 15 Feet.

import.name: Foretold Ailment
import.description: You feel your insides churning end over end and it's hard for you to breathe.

import.name: Blessing of the Iscosan Family
import.description: Knowing the history of the Iscosan sisters and having had compassion for their plight, you feel a sense of gained wisdom from their pressence.

import.name: Coherent Mumbling
import.description:
If you are also ${Drunk,, orange}$, or ${Lush,,orange}$, you are able to speak to and understand animals.

Note that animals, even when understood clearly, are still simple creatures.

import.name: Lush
import.description:
You are drunk from ${Dionysus,,orange}$'s divine enchantments and the liquor brought to the world.

You have disadvantage on all saves and skill checks, as well as a fervent desire for alcohol and to profess ${Dionysus,,orange}$'s greatness.

import.name: Empowered Azurian Aura
import.description: Empowered by a ${Blue Crystal}$, your defenses are greatly increased.

import.name: Empowered Emblazoned Aura
import.description: Empowered by a ${Red Crystal}$, your damage is greatly increased.

import.name: Empowered Jade Aura
import.description: Empowered by a ${Green Crystal}$, your damage and defense is increased.

import.name: Feared
import.description:
You can not willingly move closer to the creature of which you are afraid and as long as you can see that creature, you have disadvantage on attacks and ability checks.

At the end of each turn, if you are still feared, you may attempt another ${Wisdom,,orange}$ saving throw to shake the fear. Once shaken by a save, you can no longer be feared by the same creature. This does not apply if the fear subsides from time.

import.name: Bound Soul: Pack Mule
import.description:
You have used the souls you can control to increase the amount this summon can carry.

Soul Cost: ${2,,orange}$

import.name: Bound Soul: Fire Mage
import.description:
This summon can not carry any items or wield any weapons but it can use fire magic.

Soul Cost: ${4,,orange}$

import.name: Bound Soul: Ice Mage
import.description:
This summon can not carry any items or wield any weapons but it can use ice magic.

Soul Cost: ${4,,orange}$

import.name: Bound Soul: Defender
import.description:
The bound summon can protect an adjacent creature from attacks. depending on its equipped shield.

Defending a creature needs a shield for the size of creature being defended:
+ Medium: 8+
+ Small: 6+
+ Tiny: 4+

Soul Cost: ${3,,orange}$

import.name: Bound Soul: Health
import.description:
You have used the souls you can control to augment this summons health pool.

Soul Cost: ${1,,orange}$

import.name: Curse of the Creators
import.description:
You have a curse from the creators of the Kintari.

Hurting a creature of Evil or Neutral alignment will cause you to take ${1d4,,orange}$ Necrotic damage.

import.name: Rotting
import.description:
You are on slowly rotting.

At the end of your turn, you take damage. This effect is treated like a poison.

import.name: Arcar's Binding
import.description: When you deal damage to a Neutral or Evil aligned creature, you take ${1,,orange}$d${4,,orange}$ psychic damage.

import.name: Devil's Step
import.description: While active, your eyes glow an evil red, you feel the pull of greed, and your footsteps are always quiet.

import.name: Acid Rain
import.description:
The rain you are in is acidic, impeding your ability to fight and mildly painful.

Every round you take acid damage and your armor is less effective.

import.name: Tainted Rain
import.description:
The rain you are in is tainted with a vile essence, impeding your ability to fight and mildly painful.

Every round you take ${Necrotic,,orange}$ damage and your ${Armor,,orange}$ is less effective.

import.name: Mental Exhaustion
import.description: You've exhausted your mind attempting some task and need 2 long rests to recover.

import.name: Onslaught's Embrace
import.description:
Any creature who would successfully disarm or grapple you takes ${1d6,,orange}$ of ${Cold,,orange}$ damage, though you may still be grappled.

Any creature that continues to grapple you takes ${1d4,,orange}$ of ${Cold,,orange}$ damage at the start of their turn.

import.name: Stunned
import.description:
You have been stunned by a jolt of ${Lightning,,orange}$ damage.

Make a ${Constitution,,orange}$ DC${13,,orange}$ Save at the end of your turn to try to end this effect early.

import.name: Aspect of Durong
import.description:
Your skin has paled and your eyes are gushing blood.

This effect can not be healed or dispelled.

import.name: Sense Friend Markings
import.description:
You have been marked by a friendly creature so that it may identify you.

However, the scent marking is quite strong.

import.name: Discrete Sense Friend Markings
import.description:
You have been marked by a friendly creature so that it may identify you.

However, the scent marking is fairly noticeable, but not as strong as it could be.

import.name: Potion of Vigilance
import.description: Having consumed a Potion of Vigilance, you can not sleep, magically or naturally, for 1 minute and have advantage on ${Initiative}$ checks.

import.name: Greater Potion of Vigilance
import.description: Having consumed a Potion of Vigilance, you can not sleep, magically or naturally, for 1 minute and have advantage on ${Initiative}$ checks.

import.name: Unable to Speak
import.description: You are unable to speak.
import.note:
Previous Conditions: {
    "paralyzed": false,
    "acid": false,
    "frightened": false,
    "fatigued": false,
    "grappled": false,
    "muted": true
}

import.name: Grappled
import.description:
You are grappled. You can use an action to attempt to break free.

Your movement is 0.

Attacks against you have advantage.

You have disadvantage on dex saving throws and ability checks.

import.name: Ignited
import.description:
You are on fire and take 1d6 ${Fire}$ damage at the start of your turn.

You or another creature may spend an action to douse the flames on you.

Also, being exposed to water or something else that may douse the flame in another way will also extinguish the flames.

import.name: Blink
import.description: You have blinked, when it is not your turn, you are shifted to the Ethereal Realm.

import.name: Giest Chains
import.description: You are bound by a Giest's chains and subject to the Giest's compulsions.
import.note:
Previous Conditions: {
    "paralyzed": false,
    "acid": false,
    "frightened": false,
    "fatigued": false,
    "grappled": true
}

import.name: Draconic Dragon Wings
import.description: You have summoned your dragon wings and can now fly at your movement speed.

import.name: Swimming
import.description: You are swimming at a basic pace.

import.name: Heavy Storm Rains
import.description: The storm rain is thick enough to effect your ability to perform some skills.

import.name: Heavy Acid Storm Rains
import.description: The storm rain is thick enough to effect your ability to perform some skills.

import.name: Heavy Poison Storm Rains
import.description:
The storm rain is thick enough to effect your ability to perform some skills.

While weak, the poison can still have an effect, if caught in the rain, must pass a ${5,,orange}$DC ${Constitution}$ save.

import.name: Heavy Snow Storm
import.description:
The storm rain is thick enough to effect your ability to perform some skills.

While weak, the poison can still have an effect, if caught in the rain, must pass a ${5,,orange}$DC ${Constitution}$ save.

import.name: Iludis Effect
import.description: Having successfully smoked a ${Iludis Effect}$, your body feels energized.

import.name: Havoc Bread Effect
import.description: Having consumed ${Havoc Bread}$ you hit harder with weapons.

import.name: Havoc Bread
import.description: Having consumed ${Havoc Bread}$, your body is in overdrive, increasing the force with which you strike.

import.name: Hexed
import.description: You have disadvantage on ability checks on the ability named by the caster. Additionally, you take extra damage from that creature as well, though you may not immediately know who that creature is.

import.name: Spiked
import.description: You are aware that your mind has been spiked by a caster and that you are currently being tracked.

import.name: Bull's Strength
import.description: Your strength has been bolstered.

import.name: Bear's Endurance
import.description: In addition, you gain 2d6 ${Temporary HP}$ when you receive this effect (This addition is manual).

import.name: Cat's Grace
import.description: In addition, you take no fall damage from falling ${10,,studs}$ or less if you aren't incapacitated.

import.name: Eagle's Splendor
import.description: Your charisma has been bolstered.

import.name: Fox's Cunning
import.description: Your intelligence has been bolstered.

import.name: Olw's Wisdom
import.description: Your wisdom has been bolstered.

import.name: Grievously Wounded
import.description: You have suffered substantial wounds, and while they may be mended, you are in need of greater attention.
import.note: Can not be cure with Dispell Magic or normal healing spells, requires greater restoration, possibly several times.

import.name: Grievously Weakened
import.description: You have suffered substantial wounds, and while they may be mended, you are in need of greater attention.
import.note: Can not be cure with Dispell Magic or normal healing spells, requires greater restoration, possibly several times.

import.name: Grievously Distrought
import.description: You have suffered substantial wounds, and while they may be mended, you are in need of greater attention.
import.note: Can not be cure with Dispell Magic or normal healing spells, requires greater restoration, possibly several times.

import.name: Grievously Distressed
import.description: You have suffered substantial wounds, and while they may be mended, you are in need of greater attention.
import.note: Can not be cure with Dispell Magic or normal healing spells, requires greater restoration, possibly several times.

import.name: Death Warded
import.description:
If you drop to ${0,,orange}$HP while under this effect you instead drop to ${1,,orange}$HP.

If an a force would kill you instantly, this effect is instead ended and the force canceled.

import.name: Altered Self
import.description: You have altered yourself, taking on another form. Use the notes field for details.

import.name: Chilled Movement
import.description: Your body is chilled, slowing your movement.

import.name: Steeping
import.description: Your next attack roll is reduced by the amount noted here.

import.name: Holy Weapon
import.description:
Your weapon emits bright light in a ${15,,orange}$ stud radius and dim light for an additional ${15,,orange}$ studs. In addition, weapon attacks made with it deal an extra 2d8 ${Radiant}$ damage on a hit. If the weapon isn’t already a magic weapon, it becomes one for the duration.

As a ${Bonus Action}$ on your turn, you can dismiss this spell and cause the weapon to emit a burst of radiance. Each creature of your choice that you can see within ${20,,orange}$ studs of you must make a ${Constitution}$ saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 4d8 ${Radiant}$ damage, and it is blinded for ${1,,orange}$ minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn’t blinded. At the end of each of its turns, a blinded creature can make a ${Constitution}$ saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

import.name: Shield
import.description: Your armor has been increased by the magical spell Shield granting the bonus for ${6,,orange}$ seconds.

import.name: Heavy Cover
import.description: Due to near-by obstacles, you have additional armor against attacks directed toward you.

import.name: Recently Revived (Day 1)
import.description: You have recently been brought back from the dead. Your senses and abilities are recovering from the ordeal.

import.name: Recently Revived (Day 2)
import.description: You have recently been brought back from the dead. Your senses and abilities are recovering from the ordeal.

import.name: Recently Revived (Day 3)
import.description: You have recently been brought back from the dead. Your senses and abilities are recovering from the ordeal.

import.name: Recently Revived (Day 4)
import.description: You have recently been brought back from the dead. Your senses and abilities are recovering from the ordeal.

import.name: Recently Revived (Day 5)
import.description: You have recently been brought back from the dead. Your senses and abilities are recovering from the ordeal.

import.name: Recently Revived (Day 6)
import.description: You have recently been brought back from the dead. Your senses and abilities are recovering from the ordeal.

import.name: Mage Armor
import.description:
A protective magical force surrounds you. Your base AC is effectively ${13,,orange}$.

The spell ends if you put on armor or if the caster dismisses the spell as an action.

import.name: Ally of Reservera
import.description: You gain ${1,,orange}$AC for being near an ally wielding the shield ${Reservera}$.

import.name: Hoppy
import.description: You are able to jump unusually high and have advantage on ${Athletics}$ checks involving jumping or landing.

import.name: Hexed: Perception
import.description: You have disadvantage on ability checks on the ability named by the caster. Additionally, you take extra damage from that creature as well, though you may not immediately know who that creature is.

import.name: Hexed: Acrobatics
import.description: You have disadvantage on ability checks on the ability named by the caster. Additionally, you take extra damage from that creature as well, though you may not immediately know who that creature is.

import.name: Dodging
import.description: Attacks against you are done at disadvantage

import.name: Ancient Constriction
import.description:
You have been bound by an ancient runic golem.

You are considered ${Silenced}$ and ${Restrained}$.

If you are still restrained at the end of your turn, you suffer 2d12 ${Crushing}$ damage 

Any creature can attempt an ${Athletics}$ check against the Golem's ${Strength}$ save to attempt to free you.

Additionally, this requires concentration from the Golem and on a failed save, you are released.

import.name: Bound Arcane Service
import.description: You are bound in service and are unable to consume souls and your touch is no longer harmful.

import.name: Protection from Good and Evil
import.description:
This protection grants several benefits:  
+ Creatures of those types have disadvantage on attack rolls against the target.
+ The target can't be charmed, frightened, or possessed by them. If the target is already charmed, frightened, or possessed by such a creature, the target has advantage on any new saving throw against the relevant effect.

import.name: Servant's Armor
import.description: Increased armor and a period of invulnerability depending on attacks.

import.name: Speak with the Dead
import.description: You are currently able to speak with the dead to some degree or another.

import.name: Purring Cat
import.description: A spirit cat is purring on your shoulder.

import.name: Poisoned
import.description:
You are poisoned!

At the end of your turn, make a ${Constitution}$ save against the source DC, ending this effect on success or continuing it on failure.

You take 1d6 ${Poison}$ damage at the end of your turn.

import.name: Symphonic
import.description: You are wearing and attuned with a ${Symphonic}$ item that shares damage with other bearer's of this effect.

import.name: Greater Invisibility
import.description:
You are invisible until the spell ends. Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on you.

If you pick anything up or attacks, it remains invisible. Additionally, any acquired items of size 12 blocks or less also become invisible. Any items acquired with a size greater than 12 blocks simply appear to float in the air.

import.name: Green Crystalline Poison
import.description:
You have been poisoned and can feel small crystals in your blood burning and scratching at your flesh.

At the start of your turn you take 1d12 ${Poison}$ damage and another 1d12 of ${Acid}$ damage.

At the end of your turn, make a ${Constitution}$ save against the source's ${Spell DC}$.

import.name: Blue Crystalline Toxin
import.description:
You can feel your joints stiffening and your body aches as your move.

At the end of your turn, make a ${Constitution}$ save against the source's ${Spell DC}$.

If this toxin ends naturally, you become ${Petrified}$.

import.name: Red Crystalline Toxin
import.description:
Your body feels like its on fire, your eyes itch and your skin feels like it's boiling.

At the start of your turn you take 1d6 ${Fire}$ damage and another 1d6 ${Necrotic}$ damage.

At the end of your turn, make a ${Constitution}$ save against the source's ${Spell DC}$.

If this toxin ends naturally at the end of your turn, you fall dead, exploding in a violent fireball dealing your Level (${level,,orange}$) times your ${Current HP}$ (${health,,orange}$ in damage over a 20 stud radius (Currently ${level * health,,orange}$ Fire Damage).

import.name: Exhaustion: Movement (15)
import.description: Your movement speed is reduced by half.

import.name: Exhaustion: Movement (20)
import.description: Your movement speed is reduced by half.

import.name: Exhaustion: Movement (12)
import.description: Your movement speed is reduced by half.

import.name: Exhaustion: Movement (24)
import.description: Your movement speed is reduced by half.

import.name: Overburdened
import.description: You are currently overburdened and find movement difficult.

import.name: Heavily Poisoned
import.description:
You are poisoned!

At the end of your turn, make a ${Constitution}$ save against the source DC, ending this effect on success or continuing it on failure.

You take 1d12 ${Poison}$ damage at the end of your turn.

import.name: Burning
import.description:
You are on fire and take 1d12 ${Fire}$ damage at the start of your turn.

You or another creature may spend an action to douse the flames on you.

Also, being exposed to water or something else that may douse the flame in another way will also extinguish the flames.

import.name: Scorching
import.description:
You are on fire and take 2d12 ${Fire}$ damage at the start of your turn.

You or another creature may spend an action to douse the flames on you.

Also, being exposed to water or something else that may douse the flame in another way will also extinguish the flames.

import.name: Infected
import.description:
You are poisoned!

At the end of your turn, make a ${Constitution}$ save against the source DC, ending this effect on success or continuing it on failure.

You take 2d12 ${Poison}$ damage at the end of your turn.

import.name: White Glow
import.description: An odd white glow that seems to overlap with an existing aura of some kind...
import.note: Occurs with closeness to divine related magics.

import.name: Curse: Impairment
import.description: Your mind is impaired, making decisions difficult. You are notably slower until this effect is removed.

import.name: Thought Shield
import.description: A clouding veil has been woven over your mind. For the duration, your mind can’t be read or detected, creatures can’t telepathically communicate with you unless you allow it.

import.name: Slowed
import.description:
Your speed is halved and you can’t use ${reactions}$ in addition to the other effects.

On your turn, you can use either an ${Action}$ or a ${Bonus Action}$, not both. Regardless of your abilities or magic items, it can’t make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn.

When casting a spell with a casting time of 1 ${Action}$, roll a d20. On an 11 or higher, the spell doesn’t take effect until your next turn, and you must use an ${Action}$ on that turn to complete the spell. If it can’t, the spell is wasted.

At the end of your turn, make a ${Wisdom}$ saving throw. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

import.name: Illusioned
import.description: An illusion envelops you so that you look different.

import.name: Displaced
import.description: Recent struck by the ${Clone Blade}$, your armor is reduced.

import.name: Egotistical
import.description: Consumed by your own ego, you are currently ${Blinded}$.
import.note:
Previous Conditions: {
    "paralyzed": false,
    "acid": false,
    "frightened": false,
    "fatigued": false,
    "grappled": false,
    "muted": false,
    "petrified": false,
    "poisoned": false,
    "restrained": false,
    "stunned": false,
    "surprising": false,
    "frozen": false,
    "deafened": false,
    "blinded": true
}

import.name: Petrified
import.description:
You are petrified.

You can be cured with ${Greater Restoration}$ or similar magics and potions.
import.note:
Previous Conditions: {
    "paralyzed": false,
    "acid": false,
    "frightened": false,
    "fatigued": false,
    "grappled": false,
    "muted": false,
    "petrified": true
}

import.name: Chilled Soul
import.description:
Your body is supernaturally chilled to its core. You are currently receive half the effects of any healing made against you.

Any effects that alter healing you receive (Such as to give you maximum healing effect) happen before this effect, (Such as giving you 50% of the maximum healing effect).

After 10 rounds, the ${Curse}$ persists, your body slowly encased in ice and all healing to you is nullified. Once you are covered in ice, you suffer 8d8 ${Cold}$ damage per round and die immediately on reaching ${0,,orange}$HP.

If you are immune to ${Cold}$ or ${Freezing}$, this curse can not afflict you.

import.name: Rusting
import.description: Your Max HP is reduced by the amount noted here.
